name: Meet Up
description:
-Single player

Goal

-Guide the white box to find the black box and vice versa.

How to play

-Arrows controls the black box

-WASD controls the white box

User Experience

-Coordinating the operation of right and left hands in a timely manner and finishing the game within the time set.

Lose

- When you collapse with the red walls or go out of the grid You will respawn from the start point.

- You will lose if you can't finish the game under 50 seconds.

Developer

Nina Mirhabibi
